content.raw:
Not sure what the problem is, but gpu_lasers fail to work:

Err] [server_main.cc:54] Ogre Error:OGRE EXCEPTION(3:RenderingAPIException): Zero sized texture surface on texture c1/rt0/rtt/140281822713608/default::prius_hybrid_123::sensors::front_left_laser_sensor_RttTex_Image face 0 mipmap 0. Probably, the GL driver refused to create the texture. in GLTexture::_createSurfaceList at /build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/RenderSystems/GL/src/OgreGLTexture.cpp (line 421)
